# _generics.timer { #caml._generics.timer }

```python
_generics.timer(operation_name=None)
```

Decorator to measure the execution time of a function or method, logged at DEBUG level.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name           | Type   | Description                                                                                      | Default   |
|----------------|--------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| operation_name |        | The name of the operation to be timed. If None, the name of the function or method will be used. | `None`    |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type     | Description                      |
|--------|----------|----------------------------------|
|        | callable | The decorated function or method |
